name: Sylpheo
tag_list: android, sfa, force-com, salesforce-com, crm, mobile-sales
overview:
Our apps increase sales calling, and make following-up each sales call instant.

The applications have Force.com embedded, and can be used as standalone apps or as a plug-in with salesforce.com

The core app is pH, which has a:

  • pH core web-based app which focuses on fast sales/customer service calling, but also includes additional features - goals, tags, email-builder
  • Sylphone - mobile component which focuses on fast calling and follow-up
  • Roadhub - car bluetooth radio app for calling and working with Salesforce.com while driving

They enable companies to big productivity gains by:

  • making sales calling fast and simple (call-chaining, to-call-cart, mobile CTI) from anywhere
  • by enabling multiple follow-up actions simultaneously with 1 click -updating the Salesforce.com in real-time

Indicators and dashboards also allow a business to track its sales/client calling performance (what works…what doesn’t…).
